creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: figure of a snarling monkey, with elongated, squared-off snout and mouth, with head slightly raised, seated on a one-legged stool on top of a seated cat; monkey holds a cup under his chin; monkey wears metal anklets, loincloth and a plant fiber rope tied around his neck; dark patina with encrustations overall including some imbedded feather fragments
medium: Wood, cloth (?), plant fibers, feathers, metal
title: Monkey figure with panther
